refsynopsisdiv.title: Methods

refsect2.title: The Register() method
refsect2.para: Called by secret Agents to register their ability to provide and save network secrets.

listitem.para: Identifies this agent; only one agent in each user session may use the same identifier. Identifier formatting follows the same rules as D-Bus bus names with the exception that the ':' character is not allowed. The valid set of characters is "[A-Z][a-z][0-9]_-." and the identifier is limited in length to 255 characters with a minimum of 3 characters. An example valid identifier is 'org.gnome.nm-applet' (without quotes).

refsect2.title: The RegisterWithCapabilities() method
refsect2.programlisting: RegisterWithCapabilities (IN s identifier, IN u capabilities);
refsect2.para: Like Register() but indicates agent capabilities to NetworkManager.

listitem.para: See the Register() method's identifier argument.
(NMSecretAgentCapabilities) Indicates various agent capabilities to NetworkManager.

refsect2.title: The Unregister() method
refsect2.para: Called by secret Agents to notify NetworkManager that they will no longer handle requests for network secrets. Agents are automatically unregistered when they disconnect from D-Bus.
